title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You long to fulfill a dream of excellence, whether its for a moment, a state of being, or a project. You might even feel this yearning more deeply today since something or someone recently reminded you of whats imperfect about life. However, perfection also signals where theres no longer any need for growth. You could create a more static world than the dynamic one that swirls all around you. Maybe the most perfect action you can take is to accept your blemishes without blame or guilt. Your devotion to improvement becomes your fuel rather than the fire that destroys you. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
